title: Exquisite Floral Diamond & Pink Tourmaline Cascade Jhumka
materials: Crafted with precision in 18K White and Rose Gold
these earrings are adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds (D Pan
1/10th ct) and vibrant Pink Tourmaline gemstones. Features a high Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: These contemporary jhumkas showcase a cascading floral design. Each flower, meticulously crafted, is set with sparkling diamonds. The bottom section features a delicate fan of carefully set pink tourmalines. The design perfectly blends modern aesthetics with a touch of South Indian elegance.
colors: The color palette features a luxurious blend of white and rose gold
perfectly complemented by the dazzling white diamonds and the rich pink hue of the Tourmalines. This combination offers a sophisticated and contemporary aesthetic.
occasions: or adding a touch of elegance to your everyday attire. These earrings can also be worn on special occasions like festive celebrations and family gatherings.
description: These stunning earrings offer a unique blend of modern design and gemstone elegance. The quality craftsmanship, coupled with the brilliance of diamonds and the vibrant hue of the Tourmalines, makes this a truly special piece. The earrings are designed for lasting durability and enduring style, making them a valuable addition to your jewelry collection.
